items.name: Pink Sapphire Halo Ring
items.description: A sweet 18ct rose gold ring made circa 1940. With a lovely emerald cut pink sapphire set in a diamond halo. In near-perfect condition, would make a lovely engagement ring.

items.name: Pear Diamond Double Frame Halo Ring
items.description: A stunning pear cut diamond with a double halo made circa 1950. Stone is brilliantly clear, in very good condition. A wonderful piece to add to your collection!

items.name: Two Stone Pavé Diamond Ring
items.description: A unique verticle stack 'toi et moi' two stone diamond ring made circa 1930-1940. Both stones are round cut, clear white and accented by a lovely pavé set band.

items.name: Round Diamond Halo Ring
items.description: A lively sterling silver diamond halo ring made circa 1950. The centre claw set diamond is a brilliantly bright white stone. Around it are fourteen claw set smaller diamonds. The band has a beautiful pavé setting, would make a wonderful enagagement ring!

items.name: Yellow Diamond Solitaire Ring
items.description: A beautiful platinum solitaire diamond ring that was made circa 1920-1930. It has been prong set with a brilliant round cut diamond. It has good clarity and slight yellow colour. A simple, timeless ring!

items.name: Half-Eternity Diamond Band Ring
items.description: A simple rose gold half-eternity band ring made circa 1960. Set with 14 small diamonds, all with great clarity and white colour. Would make a lovely wedding band or anniversary ring.
